title: Ebro In The Morning - Jay-Z Back In The Studio + Kofi Kingston Joins The Program
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Ebro, Rosenberg and Laura Stylez star in HOT97's flagship program Ebro in the Morning - this episode aired on 3/24/2022.

Rosenberg, Laura Stylez and the crew are in the studio discussing everything under the sun from Jay-Z's new project, HOV and Beyonce's Oscar Party, and the importance of breast cancer detection.

WWE star Kofi Kingston sits down with Ebro in the Morning to discuss WrestleMania, updates on Big E after breaking his neck earlier this month, traveling with the family, and more! WWE's Wrestlemania airs live Saturday, April 2 & Sunday April 3 on Peacock! Catch Smackdown at the Barclay's Center this Friday!  

Get excited for the gurus to help solve your problems and get the latest news with Flashing Lights. All that and more on Ebro In The Morning! 

Please like and subscribe to Ebro In The Morning.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
